text: Taura (iwe Muhammad (SAW)): “Ndiudzei zvamunofunga maererano nezvamunodaidza kuti vanamwari kunze kwaAllah? Ndiratidzei kunyangwe chavakasika pano panyika. Kana kuti vane here kunyangwe chidimbu kumatenga? Kana kuti takavapa Gwaro kuti vakwanise kuzotevedzera hwapupu huri mariri? Vaiti vezvakaipa havavimbisani kusara kwenyengedzo.”
